title: Handle app factory in FLASK_APP
raw_output:
{'files_to_modify': ['flask/cli.py', 'flask/helpers.py', 'flask/app.py', 'tests/test_cli.py', 'docs/patterns/appfactories.rst'], 'reasoning': '1. flask/cli.py – contains logic for discovering, parsing, and invoking app factories from FLASK_APP; main target for regex and argument handling improvements.
2. flask/helpers.py – may house reusable regex or literal evaluation routines imported by cli.py for parsing callable strings/arguments.
3. flask/app.py – core application logic; may need minor changes if loading/signature handling refactoring is required for factories.
4. tests/test_cli.py – must be updated/created to test support for new FLASK_APP factory string features, e.g., positional/keyword arguments.
5. docs/patterns/appfactories.rst – documentation needs to be updated to reflect new usage pattern for app factories in FLASK_APP.'}
